[[File:DuskStone.jpeg|thumb|200px|The Dusk Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Dusk Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Solaceon Town]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Murkrow || | Honchkrow |- | Misdreavus || | Mismagius |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
